Welcome to NosytOS95

Welcome to NosytOS95, a Windows 95-style interface for NosytLabs. This help file will guide you through the features and functionality of NosytOS95.

⚠️ DEVELOPMENT VERSION ⚠️ - NosytOS95 is currently under active development. Many features are still being implemented and may not work as expected.

NosytOS95 is a nostalgic recreation of the classic Windows 95 operating system, with basic window management and a few applications. We're continuously adding new features and fixing issues.

To get started, click on the Start button in the bottom-left corner of the screen, or explore the desktop icons.

Note: For the best experience, use a desktop browser. Mobile support is limited at this time.

The Desktop

The desktop is your main workspace in NosytOS95. It contains icons for applications and features.

Double-click on any active icon to open the corresponding application.

Right-click on the desktop to access a context menu with additional options.

Available Desktop Icons:

  • Notepad - Simple text editor
  • Duck Hunt - Classic shooting game
  • Nosyt AI - AI assistant

Coming Soon:

  • My Computer - Browse the file system
  • Doom II - Classic FPS game
  • Terminal - Command-line interface
  • Internet Explorer - Web browser

Icons marked as "Coming Soon" are currently under development and will be available in future updates.

The Start Menu

The Start Menu provides quick access to applications and features in NosytOS95.

Click the Start button in the bottom-left corner to open the Start Menu.

Start Menu Items:

  • Notepad - Simple text editor
  • Duck Hunt - Classic shooting game
  • Nosyt AI - AI assistant
  • Help - Access this help system
  • Exit to Website - Return to the NosytLabs website

Keyboard Shortcut: Press Ctrl+Esc to open the Start Menu.

Note: Some features are currently under development and will be available in future updates.

Working with Windows

NosytOS95 uses a window-based interface for applications and system components.

Window Controls:

  • Minimize (_) - Minimize the window to the taskbar
  • Maximize (□) - Expand the window to fill the screen
  • Close (×) - Close the window

Window Management:

  • Drag the title bar to move a window
  • Drag the edges or corners to resize a window
  • Click anywhere on a window to bring it to the front
  • Minimize windows to reduce clutter
  • Use Alt+Tab to switch between open windows

Applications

NosytOS95 is currently in development with limited application functionality.

Currently Working:

  • Notepad - Simple text editor with basic functionality
  • Help - This help system with information about NosytOS95

Partially Working:

  • Start Menu - Basic functionality, some items may not work
  • Window Management - Basic window movement and resizing

In Development:

  • Duck Hunt - Classic shooting game (coming soon)
  • Doom II - Classic FPS game (coming soon)
  • Nosyt AI Assistant - AI-powered assistant (coming soon)
  • File Browser - Simple file system navigation (coming soon)

We're actively working on implementing these features. Check back regularly for updates!

Keyboard Shortcuts

NosytOS95 supports various keyboard shortcuts for efficient navigation and control.

General Shortcuts:

  • Ctrl+Esc - Open Start Menu
  • Alt+Tab - Switch between windows
  • Alt+F4 - Close active window
  • F1 - Open Help
  • Windows Key - Open Start Menu (if available)

Window Management:

  • Alt+Space - Open window menu
  • Alt+Hyphen - Open window menu
  • Ctrl+F4 - Close active document

Secret Shortcuts:

  • Ctrl+Alt+D - Toggle hidden desktop mode
  • Ctrl+Alt+N - Activate Nosyt AI Assistant
  • Ctrl+Alt+G - Enable game mode

Easter Eggs

NosytOS95 contains several hidden features and Easter eggs for you to discover!

Hint: Try these actions to find Easter eggs:

  • Type "nosyt" in the Run dialog
  • Press Ctrl+Alt+D on the desktop
  • Click the Start button while holding Shift+Alt
  • Type "about:nosyt" in Internet Explorer
  • Click on the clock 5 times in a row
  • Press Up, Up, Down, Down, Left, Right, Left, Right, B, A on the desktop

Secret: There's a hidden game accessible by typing "nosyt95" in the Run dialog!

Press F1 for help on help

It looks like you're exploring NosytOS95! This is a development version with limited functionality.
